skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sathya sai discourses
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"""Sai Ram from Prasanthi Nilayam! We are offering 24/7 Radio Stream of Spiritual Guidance on Meditation, Lifestyle , Human Values, Service, Love & Peace from Prasanthi Nilayam, offered to all Spiritual Seekers! These Discourses of Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba are eternal treasure, the Modern Gita to the world! The skill content 'Discourses' are in Telugu language followed with English Translation. 

To access the skill please follow the following steps
a) Enable Alexa Skill : There are three ways of activating Alexa Skills. One through Alexa App, Activating Alexa Skills Via Voice Commands and Activating Alexa Skills Via the Amazon Site
b) After Enabling the Skill, You will be able to play discourses

1) Activating Alexa Skills Via the App
Open up the app and tap on More at the bottom right, then tap on Skills & Games. 
Search for the Skill and Enable.

2) Activating Alexa Skills Via Voice Commands
Say """"Alexa, Enable Sathya Sai Discourses""""

3) Activating Alexa Skills Via the Amazon Site
Search for the Skill on Alexa Skills Page on Amazon https://www.amazon.com/alexa-skills/b?ie=UTF8&node=13727921011
Enable through the Alexa Skills Page"""
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
